name: ORS NOMIS Inactive User Report
description:
This report provides a list of users who haven't logged into NOMIS within a default period of the last 14 days; the end user may change the default period at runtime. In addition, users are listed who had accounts created a year ago or more (as of today) but have no activity recorded at all.
CAD0002 - v00.00.04

dataset.name: Inactive Users
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME, COALESCE(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_USER_TYPE, 'N/A') AS NOMIS_USER_ACCOUNT_TYPE, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.WORKING_CASELOAD_ID, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.ACCOUNT_STATUS, TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.LOCK_DATE) AS RU_USER_LOCK_DATE_, TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.EXPIRY_DATE) AS RU_USER_EXPIRY_DATE_, TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.CREATED) AS RU_USER_CREATION_DATE_, MAX(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.TIMESTAMP) AS DATE_OF_LAST_ACTION_ FROM AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS WHERE (AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID = AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID) AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.USERNAME = AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME) AND (AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME (+) = AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME) AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.RECORD_EXISTS = 'Y') AND (NOT COALESCE(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME, 'N/A') IN (SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.USERNAME, 'N/A') FROM AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS WHERE (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.USERNAME = AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME) AND (AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME (+) = AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME) AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.RECORD_EXISTS = 'Y') AND (COALESCE(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.USERNAME, 'N/A') = AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME AND AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.ACTION BETWEEN 100 AND 102 AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.TIMESTAMP >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('No. of days before Current Day','N',,,,Not_Persistent,{'14'},,) */)) AND AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.TIMESTAMP < TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + 1)) AND AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.RETURNCODE = 0)) AND AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.REMOTE_DB = 'CNOMIS' AND AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.ACTION BETWEEN 100 AND 102 AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.TIMESTAMP < TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('No. of days before Current Day','N',,,,Not_Persistent,{'14'},,) */) + 1)) AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.REMOTE_DB = 'CNOMIS')) GROUP BY AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME, COALESCE(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_USER_TYPE, 'N/A'), AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.WORKING_CASELOAD_ID, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.ACCOUNT_STATUS, TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.LOCK_DATE), TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.EXPIRY_DATE), TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.CREATED) UNION SELECT DISTINCT AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME, COALESCE(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_USER_TYPE, 'N/A') AS NOMIS_USER_ACCOUNT_TYPE, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.WORKING_CASELOAD_ID, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.ACCOUNT_STATUS, TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.LOCK_DATE) AS RU_USER_LOCK_DATE_, TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.EXPIRY_DATE) AS RU_USER_EXPIRY_DATE_, TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.CREATED) AS RU_USER_CREATION_DATE_, TO_DATE('31/12/3900', 'dd/MM/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_LAST_ACTION_ FROM AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS WHERE (AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID = AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID) AND (AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME (+) = AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME) AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.RECORD_EXISTS = 'Y') AND (TRUNC(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.CREATED) >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - 365 AND NOT COALESCE(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME, 'N/A') IN (SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.USERNAME, 'N/A') FROM AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS WHERE (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.USERNAME = AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME) AND (AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME (+) = AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.USERNAME) AND (AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.RECORD_EXISTS = 'Y') AND ((AUDITDATA.REMOTE_USERS.REMOTE_DB = 'CNOMIS') AND AUDITDATA.REMOTE_AUDIT_TRAIL.REMOTE_DB = 'CNOMIS')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, USERNAME, NOMIS_USER_ACCOUNT_TYPE, WORKING_CASELOAD_ID, ACCOUNT_STATUS, RU_USER_LOCK_DATE_, RU_USER_EXPIRY_DATE_, RU_USER_CREATION_DATE_, DATE_OF_LAST_ACTION_, 'TBD' AS V_LAST_LOGON FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: unknown_parameter
parameters.display: No. of days before Current Day

field.name: $ref:V_LAST_LOGON
field.legacySql: =If([Date of Last Action (DD/MM/YY HH24:MI:SS)]='31/12/3900';"";[Date of Last Action (DD/MM/YY HH24:MI:SS)])
